item.title: 20240105 Android, Nix, and Even Some Education
item.description: I came across this guide that lays out how to start contributing to Gadgetbridge. It’s not Nix, it’s me Since I’m in the mode of playing around with shell.nix files, I immediately jumped to creating one for this project. { pkgs ? import <nixpkgs> {} }: pkgs.mkShell { # nativeBuildInputs is usually what you want -- tools you need to run nativeBuildInputs = with pkgs.buildPackages; [ #android-studio androidStudioPackages.dev git openjdk17-bootstrap gradle_7 ]; } A quick switch, and we’re off to the races, right?
